title: CLDF dataset derived from Blum et al.'s "A phylolinguistic classification of the Quechua language family" from 2023
description:
Cite the source of the dataset as:

Blum, Frederic and Barrientos Ugarte, Carlos and Poirier, Zoe and Ingunza, Adriano. Accepted. A phylolinguistic classification of the Quechua language family. _Indiana_. DOI: 10.31235/osf.io/twu6a
